DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate clinical success and performance of the GORE® Septal Occluder when used for percutaneous, transcatheter closure of Patent Foramen Ovale (PFO).
DOC.brief_title: GORE® Septal Occluder European Union Clinical Evaluation
DOC.criteria: Subjects with a PFO less than or equal to 17mm
